newsitem.title: USA: DSP Comms to acquire Proxim.
newsitem.headline: DSP Comms to acquire Proxim.

text.p: DSP Communications Inc and Proxim Inc said Tuesday their boards had approved a merger through a tax-free exchange of shares valued at about $400 million, based on DSPC's closing stock price on October 28.
Under the agreement, Proxim stockholders will receive 0.70 share of DSPC for each Proxim share, subject to adjustment.
The merger is intended to qualify as a tax-free reorganization and a pooling of interests. It is expected to close by the end of January and is subject to shareholder and regulatory approval.

Based on the number of new shares to be issued by DSPC and the closing price for DSPC common stock on October 28, the combined company would have a market capitalization of about $1.7 billion, the companies said.
The combined company will be a powerful force in both the indoor and outdoor wireless voice and data communications markets, they said.
